Add.Name: GetTopLinkXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Layout.Navigation.TopLink.GetTopLinkXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="Page.Title" /><f:paramelement value="PageId" /><f:paramelement value="Page.MenuTitle" /><f:paramelement value="Page" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Layout.Navigation.TopLink.ActivePageReferenceFilter"><f:param name="SitemapScope" value="AncestorsAndCurrent" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="OrderByField" value="Position" /></f:function>
